alert.note: Alert for Portage; Waupaca; Waushara (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 09 at 11:25PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Portage, western Waushara and western Waupaca Counties through 1215 AM CDT... At 1123 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Stevens Point to near Whiting to near Necedah. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Stevens Point and Whiting around 1130 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Amherst, Hartman Creek State Park, Chain O` Lakes-King and Waupaca. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
